indexSubhead: I’m a UX/UI Designer and Front-End Developer based in Barcelona. I help teams prototype, design and develop digital products using the latest front-end techniques and design patterns to create scalable, user focused experiences.
blogTitle: My thoughts on UX, UI and Code.
